Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Server
extends javax.swing.JFrame
This class is run when the server is started.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • userStatus

      public java.lang.String userStatus​(java.net.DatagramPacket receive)
      Determines the status of the user using various hashmap information.
      Parameters:
      receive - DatagramPacket from Client (WordleController)
      Returns:
      String: status of user (new, started (in progress), or completed)

    • resetDay

      public void resetDay()
      Reset the words when the local time is at midnight

    • waitForPackets

      public void waitForPackets()
      This method waits for packets to arrive, display data and echo packet to client

    • sendPacketToClient

      private void sendPacketToClient​(java.net.DatagramPacket receivePacket) throws java.io.IOException
      Creates new packet and echoes the packet to the client.
      Parameters:
      receivePacket - Datagram packet to echo
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Thrown upon IO error

    • displayMessage

      private void displayMessage​(java.lang.String messageToDisplay)
      This method manipulates displayArea in the event-dispatch thread
      Parameters:
      messageToDisplay - String to display on server GUI

    • storePortAndAddress

      private void storePortAndAddress​(java.net.InetAddress address, int port)
      Adds users into the usersLoggedON hashmap (keeps track of users that have started the game).
      Parameters:
      address - reference to InetAddress of users that have logged on
      port - reference to port user is connecting to from

    • guessHandler

      public java.lang.String guessHandler​(java.lang.String guess, java.lang.String word)
      Handles all guess operations. Determines if letters are correct, incorrect, or in word.
      Parameters:
      guess - string reference to the guess that the client provides
      word - word "of the day" for the round
      Returns:
      String containing information based on its guess to send back to client

    • setUpFileWriters

      public void setUpFileWriters()
      Initialize the output files using Formatter

      public java.lang.String userHistory()

    • updateHighScore

      public void updateHighScore​(int n)
      Resets the player's high score if a higher score is obtained
      Parameters:
      n - player's score for the current day's tournament

    • convertToWriteable

      public java.lang.String convertToWriteable​(java.lang.Object[] info)
      Converts the object array into a string to return to file output
      Parameters:
      info - Array of an IP address and a score
      Returns:
      String of IP address identifier followed by the appropriate score

    • writeToTournamentData

      public void writeToTournamentData​(java.lang.String info) throws java.io.IOException
      Write to the day's tournament data file
      Parameters:
      info - String of IP address identifier followed by the appropriate score
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws if writing to file fails

    • getTournamentData

      public java.lang.String getTournamentData()

    • writeToUserHistory

      public void writeToUserHistory​(java.lang.Object[] info) throws java.io.IOException
      Write to the user history file
      Parameters:
      info - Object array that holds all user history information
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Throws if writing to file fails
